Pre-Game Insights: India head coach Manolo Márquez prefers to play good football rather than just winning the tournament.
Manolo Márquez celebrated his 56th birthday on Saturday.
Defender Jay Gupta is focused on adapting to Manolo Márquez's ideas.
The atmosphere in the dressing room is positive due to the arrival of Manolo Márquez.
Fitness-wise, there's still work to do for the players, but all 25 players are available for the match.
Syria head coach José Lana believes India plays well with the current coach and will be a difficult match.
Ahmad Madania, goalkeeper for Syria, is technically and psychologically ready for the match.
